text.1173: [03] ``bhuutapubbaaha.m, bhante, sirii {serii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} naama raajaa ahosi.m daayako  daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii. tassa mayha.m, bhante, catuusu dvaaresu daana.m  diiyittha sama.na-braahma.na-kapa.naddhika-vanibbakayaacakaana.m. atha kho ^a^T1.0083^ea^ ma.m,  bhante, itthaagaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca {itthaagaaraa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m  (ka0)} -- `devassa kho {devasseva kho (ka0 sii0)} daana.m  diiyati; amhaaka.m daana.m na diiyati. saadhu mayampi deva.m nissaaya  daanaani dadeyyaama, pu~n~naani kareyyaamaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante,  etadahosi -- `aha.m khosmi daayako daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii.  daana.m dassaamaati vadante kinti vadeyya'nti? so khvaaha.m, bhante,  pa.thama.m dvaara.m itthaagaarassa adaasi.m. tattha itthaagaarassa daana.m diiyittha;  mama daana.m pa.tikkami.
text.1174: [03] ``atha kho ma.m, bhante, khattiyaa anuyantaa upasa"nkamitvaa  etadavocu.m -- `devassa kho daana.m diiyati; itthaagaarassa daana.m diiyati;  amhaaka.m daana.m na diiyati. saadhu mayampi deva.m nissaaya daanaani  dadeyyaama, pu~n~naani kareyyaamaa'ti ^a^V1.0072^ea^. tassa mayha.m, bhante,  etadahosi -- `aha.m khosmi daayako daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii.  daana.m dassaamaati vadante kinti vadeyya'nti ^a^M1.0058^ea^? so khvaaha.m,  bhante, dutiya.m dvaara.m khattiyaana.m anuyantaana.m adaasi.m. tattha khattiyaana.m  anuyantaana.m daana.m diiyittha, mama daana.m pa.tikkami.
text.1175: [03] ``atha kho ma.m, bhante, balakaayo upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca --  `devassa kho daana.m diiyati; itthaagaarassa daana.m diiyati; khattiyaana.m  anuyantaana.m daana.m diiyati; amhaaka.m daana.m na diiyati. saadhu mayampi  deva.m nissaaya daanaani dadeyyaama, pu~n~naani kareyyaamaa'ti. tassa  ^a^P1.0059^ea^ mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `aha.m khosmi daayako  daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii. daana.m dassaamaati vadante ^a^T1.0084^ea^ kinti  vadeyya'nti? so khvaaha.m bhante, tatiya.m dvaara.m balakaayassa adaasi.m.  tattha balakaayassa daana.m diiyittha, mama daana.m pa.tikkami.
text.1176: [03] ``atha kho ma.m, bhante, braahma.nagahapatikaa upasa"nkamitvaa  etadavocu.m -- `devassa kho daana.m diiyati; itthaagaarassa daana.m diiyati;  khattiyaana.m anuyantaana.m daana.m diiyati; balakaayassa daana.m diiyati;  amhaaka.m daana.m na diiyati. saadhu mayampi deva.m nissaaya daanaani  dadeyyaama, pu~n~naani kareyyaamaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi  -- `aha.m khosmi daayako daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii. daana.m  dassaamaati vadante kinti vadeyya'nti? so khvaaha.m, bhante, catuttha.m  dvaara.m braahma.nagahapatikaana.m adaasi.m. tattha braahma.nagahapatikaana.m daana.m  diiyittha, mama daana.m pa.tikkami.
text.1177: [03] ``atha kho ma.m, bhante, purisaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m --  `na kho daani devassa koci daana.m diiyatii'ti. eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante,  te purise etadavoca.m -- `tena hi, bha.ne, yo baahiresu janapadesu  aayo sa~njaayati tato upa.d.dha.m antepure pavesetha, upa.d.dha.m tattheva daana.m  detha sama.na-braahma.na-kapa.naddhika-vanibbaka-yaacakaana'nti ^a^V1.0073^ea^. so  khvaaha.m, bhante, eva.m diigharatta.m kataana.m pu~n~naana.m eva.m diigharatta.m kataana.m  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pariyanta.m naadhigacchaami -- ettaka.m pu~n~nanti vaa  ettako pu~n~navipaakoti vaa ettaka.m sagge .thaatabbanti vaati.  acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa  --

text.1225: [03] 107^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m .thito kho  rohitasso devaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yattha nu kho, bhante,  na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati {na jiyyati na miyyati (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} na   cavati na upapajjati, sakkaa nu  kho so, bhante, gamanena lokassa ^a^M1.0061^ea^ anto ~naatu.m vaa da.t.thu.m vaa paapu.nitu.m  ^a^V1.0076^ea^ vaa''ti? ``yattha kho, aavuso, na jaayati na jiiyati na  miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, naaha.m ta.m gamanena lokassa anta.m  ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m ^a^T1.0088^ea^ patteyyanti vadaamii''ti.
text.1226: [03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m,  bhante, bhagavataa -- `yattha kho, aavuso, na jaayati na jiiyati na  miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, naaha.m ta.m gamanena lokassa anta.m  ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m patteyyanti vadaamii'ti.
text.1227: [03] ``bhuutapubbaaha.m, bhante, rohitasso naama isi ahosi.m bhojaputto  iddhimaa vehaasa"ngamo. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupo ^a^P1.0062^ea^  javo ahosi; seyyathaapi naama da.lhadhammaa {da.lhadhammo (sabbattha) .tiikaa ca  moggallaanabyaakara.na.m ca oloketabba.m} dhanuggaho susikkhito  katahattho katayoggo katuupaasano lahukena asanena appakasireneva  tiriya.m taalacchaaya.m atipaateyya. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupo  padaviitihaaro ahosi; seyyathaapi naama puratthimaa samuddaa pacchimo  samuddo. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- `aha.m  gamanena lokassa anta.m paapu.nissaamii'ti. so khvaaha.m, bhante,  evaruupena javena samannaagato evaruupena ca padaviitihaarena a~n~natreva  asita-piita-khaayita-saayitaa a~n~natra uccaara-passaavakammaa a~n~natra  niddaakilamathapa.tivinodanaa vassasataayuko vassasatajiivii vassasata.m  gantvaa appatvaava lokassa anta.m antaraava kaala"nkato.
text.1228: [03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m,  bhante, bhagavataa -- `yattha kho, aavuso, na jaayati na jiiyati na  miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, naaha.m ta.m gamanena lokassa anta.m  ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m patteyyanti vadaamii'''ti.
text.1229: [03] ``na kho ^a^T1.0089^ea^ panaaha.m, aavuso, appatvaa lokassa anta.m dukkhassa  antakiriya.m vadaami. api ca khvaaha.m, aavuso, imasmi.myeva  byaamamatte ka.levare sasa~n~nimhi samanake loka~nca pa~n~napemi  lokasamudaya~nca lokanirodha~nca lokanirodhagaamini~nca pa.tipadanti.
text.1231: [22] na ca appatvaa lokanta.m, dukkhaa atthi pamocana.m..

text.1254: [03] ``kassa ^a^M1.0063^ea^ hi naama, bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa  amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa saariputto na rucceyya?  pa.n.dito, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto ^a^T1.0091^ea^. mahaapa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa  saariputto. puthupa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. haasapa~n~no {haasupa~n~no  (sii0)},  bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. javanapa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto.  tikkhapa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. nibbedhikapa~n~no, bhante,  aayasmaa saariputto. appiccho, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto.  santu.t.tho, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. pavivitto, bhante, aayasmaa  saariputto. asa.msa.t.tho, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. aaraddhaviiriyo,  bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. vattaa, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto.  vacanakkhamo, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. codako, bhante, aayasmaa  saariputto. paapagarahii, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. kassa hi  naama, bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa  aayasmaa saariputto na rucceyyaa''ti?
text.1255: [03] ``evameta.m ^a^P1.0064^ea^, aananda, evameta.m, aananda!  kassa hi naama, aananda, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa  avipallatthacittassa saariputto na rucceyya? pa.n.dito, aananda,  saariputto. mahaapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. puthupa~n~no, aananda,  saariputto. haasapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. javanapa~n~no, aananda,  saariputto. tikkhapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. nibbedhikapa~n~no,  aananda, saariputto. appiccho, aananda, saariputto. santu.t.tho,  aananda, saariputto. pavivitto, aananda, saariputto. asa.msa.t.tho,  aananda, saariputto. aaraddhaviiriyo, aananda, saariputto. vattaa,  aananda, saariputto. vacanakkhamo, aananda, saariputto ^a^T1.0092^ea^. codako,  aananda, saariputto. paapagarahii, aananda, saariputto. kassa hi  naama, aananda, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa  saariputto na rucceyyaa''ti?
text.1256: [03] atha kho susimo {susiimo (sii0)} devaputto aayasmato saariputtassa va.n.ne  bha~n~namaane mahatiyaa devaputtaparisaaya ^a^V1.0079^ea^ parivuto yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.  ekamanta.m .thito kho susimo devaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
text.1257: [03] ``evameta.m ^a^M1.0064^ea^, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata. kassa hi naama,  bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa  saariputto na rucceyya? pa.n.dito, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto.  mahaapa~n~no, bhante, puthupa~n~no, bhante, haasapa~n~no, bhante, javanapa~n~no,  bhante, tikkhapa~n~no, bhante, nibbedhikapa~n~no, bhante, appiccho, bhante,  santu.t.tho, bhante, pavivitto, bhante, asa.msa.t.tho, bhante, aaraddhaviiriyo,  bhante, vattaa, bhante, vacanakkhamo, bhante, codako, bhante, paapagarahii,  bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. kassa hi naama, bhante, abaalassa  adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa saariputto na  rucceyya?
text.1258: [03] ``ahampi hi, bhante, ya~n~nadeva devaputtaparisa.m upasa"nkami.m,  etadeva bahula.m sadda.m su.naami -- `pa.n.dito aayasmaa saariputto;  mahaapa~n~no aayasmaa, puthupa~n~no aayasmaa, haasapa~n~no aayasmaa,  javanapa~n~no aayasmaa, tikkhapa~n~no aayasmaa, nibbedhikapa~n~no  aayasmaa, appiccho aayasmaa, santu.t.tho aayasmaa, pavivitto aayasmaa,  asa.msa.t.tho aayasmaa, aaraddhaviiriyo aayasmaa, vattaa aayasmaa,  vacanakkhamo aayasmaa, codako aayasmaa, paapagarahii aayasmaa  saariputto'ti ^a^T1.0093^ea^. kassa hi naama, bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa  amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa saariputto na rucceyyaa''ti?
text.1259: [03] atha kho susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisaa aayasmato  saariputtassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamanaa pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa  uccaavacaa va.n.nanibhaa upada.mseti.
text.1260: [03] ``seyyathaapi naama ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso  suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale nikkhitto bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati  ca; evameva.m susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisaa ^a^P1.0065^ea^  aayasmato saariputtassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamanaa pamuditaa  piitisomanassajaataa uccaavacaa va.n.nanibhaa upada.mseti.

text.1394: [03] 120^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena  ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito hoti, pa~nca ca  usabhasataani pa~nca ca vacchatarasataani pa~nca ca vacchatarisataani pa~nca  ca ^a^P1.0076^ea^ ajasataani pa~nca ca urabbhasataani  thuu.nuupaniitaani honti ya~n~natthaaya. yepissa te honti daasaati vaa  pessaati vaa kammakaraati vaa, tepi da.n.datajjitaa bhayatajjitaa  assumukhaa rudamaanaa parikammaani karonti.

text.1396: [03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo  abhaasi --

text.1408: [03] 121^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ra~n~naa pasenadinaa  kosalena mahaajanakaayo bandhaapito hoti, appekacce rajjuuhi appekacce  anduuhi appekacce sa"nkhalikaahi.
text.1409: [03] atha ^a^P1.0077^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m  nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya pavisi.msu. saavatthiya.m  pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m  -- ``idha, bhante, ra~n~naa pasenadinaa kosalena mahaajanakaayo ^a^V1.0094^ea^  bandhaapito, appekacce rajjuuhi appekacce anduuhi appekacce  sa"nkhalikaahii''ti.
text.1410: [03] atha ^a^M1.0077^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa  gaathaayo abhaasi --
text.1425: [03] 122^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T1.0113^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati  pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa  saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bahidvaarako.t.thake nisinno hoti.  atha ^a^V1.0095^ea^ kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.
text.1426: [03] tena ^a^P1.0078^ea^ kho pana samayena satta ca ja.tilaa  satta ca niga.n.thaa satta ca acelakaa satta ca ekasaa.takaa satta ca  paribbaajakaa paruu.lhakacchanakhalomaa khaarivividhamaadaaya {khaarividha.m aadaaya  (pii0) dii0 ni0 1.280 tada.t.thakathaapi oloketabbaa} bhagavato  aviduure atikkamanti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo u.t.thaayaasanaa  eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dakkhi.najaa.numa.n.dala.m ^a^M1.0078^ea^ pathaviya.m  nihantvaa yena te satta ca ja.tilaa satta ca niga.n.thaa satta ca acelakaa  satta ca ekasaa.takaa satta ca paribbaajakaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa  tikkhattu.m naama.m saavesi -- ``raajaaha.m, bhante, pasenadi  kosalo...pe0... raajaaha.m, bhante, pasenadi kosalo''ti.
text.1427: [03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo acirapakkantesu tesu ^a^T1.0114^ea^ sattasu  ca ja.tilesu sattasu ca niga.n.thesu sattasu ca acelakesu sattasu ca  ekasaa.takesu sattasu ca paribbaajakesu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ye  te, bhante, loke arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa ete tesa.m  a~n~nataraa''ti.
text.1428: [03] ``dujjaana.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, tayaa gihinaa kaamabhoginaa  puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasantena kaasikacandana.m paccanubhontena  maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayantena jaataruuparajata.m saadiyantena -- `ime vaa  arahanto, ime vaa arahattamagga.m samaapannaa'''ti.
text.1429: [03] ``sa.mvaasena kho, mahaaraaja, siila.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho  diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa;  pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. sa.mvohaarena kho, mahaaraaja, soceyya.m  veditabba.m. ta~nca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no  amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. aapadaasu kho, mahaaraaja,  thaamo veditabbo. so ca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m;  manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena.  saakacchaaya ^a^P1.0079^ea^, kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa veditabbaa.  saa ca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no ^a^T1.0115^ea^  amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nenaa''ti.
text.1430: [03] ``acchariya.m ^a^V1.0096^ea^, bhante, abbhuta.m bhante! yaava  subhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- `dujjaana.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, tayaa  gihinaa kaamabhoginaa puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasantena kaasikacandana.m  paccanubhontena maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayantena jaataruuparajata.m saadiyantena  -- ime vaa arahanto, ime vaa arahattamagga.m samaapannaa'ti. sa.mvaasena  kho, mahaaraaja, siila.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho diighena addhunaa, na  ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena.  sa.mvohaarena kho mahaaraaja ^a^M1.0079^ea^, soceyya.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho  diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa;  pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. aapadaasu kho, mahaaraaja, thaamo veditabbo.  so ca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no  amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. saakacchaaya kho,  mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa veditabbaa. saa ca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m;  manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nenaa''ti.
text.1431: [03] ``ete, bhante, mama purisaa caraa ocarakaa janapada.m ocaritvaa  aagacchanti. tehi pa.thama.m oci.n.na.m aha.m pacchaa osaapayissaami {oyaayissaami  (sii0), ohayissaami (syaa0 ka.m0)}.  idaani te, bhante, ta.m rajojalla.m pavaahetvaa sunhaataa suvilittaa  kappitakesamassuu odaatavatthaa {odaatavatthavasanaa (sii0)} pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa  sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaaressantii''ti.
text.1432: [03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo  abhaasi --
text.1442: [03] 123^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0097^ea^. tena kho pana  samayena pa~ncanna.m raajuuna.m pasenadipamukhaana.m pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi  samappitaana.m sama"ngiibhuutaana.m paricaarayamaanaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi  -- ``ki.m nu kho kaamaana.m agga''nti? tatrekacce {tatreke (sii0 pii0)} evamaaha.msu --  ``ruupaa kaamaana.m agga''nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu ^a^M1.0080^ea^ -- ``saddaa  kaamaana.m agga''nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``gandhaa kaamaana.m  agga''nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``rasaa kaamaana.m agga''nti.  ekacce evamaaha.msu ^a^P1.0080^ea^ -- ``pho.t.thabbaa kaamaana.m agga''nti.  yato kho te raajaano naasakkhi.msu a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapetu.m.
text.1443: [03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo te raajaano etadavoca --  ``aayaama, maarisaa, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m etamattha.m pa.tipucchissaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakarissati  tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti {dhaareyyaamaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ``eva.m, maarisaa''ti kho te raajaano  ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa paccassosu.m.
text.1444: [03] atha kho te pa~nca raajaano pasenadipamukhaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo  bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^T1.0117^ea^ -- ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m pa~ncanna.m raajuuna.m pa~ncahi  kaamagu.nehi samappitaana.m sama"ngiibhuutaana.m paricaarayamaanaana.m  ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `ki.m nu kho kaamaana.m agga'nti?  ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `ruupaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu  -- `saddaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `gandhaa kaamaana.m  agga'nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `rasaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ekacce  evamaaha.msu -- `pho.t.thabbaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ki.m nu kho, bhante,  kaamaana.m agga''nti?
text.1445: [03] ``manaapapariyanta.m khvaaha.m, mahaaraaja, pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu  agganti vadaami. teva {te ca (sii0 pii0 ka0), ye ca (syaa0 ka.m0)}, mahaaraaja,   ruupaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti,  teva {te ca (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ruupaa ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ca yo ruupehi attamano  hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi ruupehi a~n~na.m ruupa.m uttaritara.m vaa  pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa ruupaa paramaa honti. te tassa  ruupaa anuttaraa honti.
text.1446: [03] ``teva ^a^V1.0098^ea^, mahaaraaja, saddaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva  saddaa ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ca yo saddehi attamano  hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi saddehi a~n~na.m sadda.m uttaritara.m vaa  ^a^M1.0081^ea^ pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa saddaa paramaa honti.  te tassa saddaa anuttaraa honti.
text.1447: [03] ``teva, mahaaraaja, gandhaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva gandhaa  ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ca yo gandhehi attamano hoti  paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi gandhehi a~n~na.m gandha.m uttaritara.m vaa  pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa gandhaa paramaa honti. te tassa  gandhaa anuttaraa honti.
text.1448: [03] ``teva, mahaaraaja, rasaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva rasaa  ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ca yo rasehi attamano hoti  paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi rasehi a~n~na.m rasa.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m  vaa na pattheti. te tassa rasaa paramaa honti. te tassa rasaa  anuttaraa honti.
text.1449: [03] ``teva, mahaaraaja, pho.t.thabbaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva  pho.t.thabbaa ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ^a^P1.0081^ea^ ca yo  pho.t.thabbehi attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi pho.t.thabbehi a~n~na.m  pho.t.thabba.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa ^a^T1.0118^ea^ pho.t.thabbaa  paramaa honti. te tassa pho.t.thabbaa anuttaraa hontii''ti.
text.1450: [03] tena kho pana samayena candana"ngaliko upaasako tassa.m parisaaya.m  nisinno hoti. atha kho candana"ngaliko upaasako u.t.thaayaasanaa  eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m bhagavaa, pa.tibhaati ma.m sugataa''ti.  ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m candana"ngalikaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.
text.1451: [03] atha kho candana"ngaliko upaasako bhagavato sammukhaa  tadanuruupaaya gaathaaya abhitthavi --
text.1456: [03] atha ^a^M1.0082^ea^ kho te pa~nca raajaano candana"ngalika.m upaasaka.m  pa~ncahi uttaraasa"ngehi acchaadesu.m. atha kho candana"ngaliko upaasako  tehi pa~ncahi uttaraasa"ngehi bhagavanta.m acchaadesiiti.
text.1458: [03] 124  ^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena raajaa  pasenadi kosalo do.napaakakura.m {do.napaakasuda.m (sii0), do.napaaka.m suda.m (pii0)} bhu~njati.   atha kho raajaa pasenadi ^a^T1.0119^ea^  kosalo bhuttaavii mahassaasii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.
text.1459: [03] atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhuttaavi.m mahassaasi.m  viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
text.1464: [03] tena ^a^P1.0082^ea^ kho pana samayena sudassano maa.navo  ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pi.t.thito .thito hoti. atha kho raajaa  pasenadi kosalo sudassana.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, taata  sudassana, bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m pariyaapu.nitvaa mama bhattaabhihaare  (bhattaabhihaare) {( ) sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} bhaasa. aha~nca   te devasika.m kahaapa.nasata.m  (kahaapa.nasata.m) {( ) sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 potthakesu natthi} nicca.m bhikkha.m   pavattayissaamii''ti. ``eva.m devaa''ti  kho sudassano maa.navo ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pa.tissutvaa  bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m pariyaapu.nitvaa ra~n~no pasenadissa  kosalassa bhattaabhihaare suda.m bhaasati --
text.1469: [03] atha ^a^M1.0083^ea^ kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo anupubbena  naa.likodanaparamataaya {naa.likodanamattaaya (ka0)} sa.n.thaasi. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo  aparena samayena susallikhitagatto paa.ninaa gattaani anumajjanto taaya.m  velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``ubhayena vata ma.m so bhagavaa atthena  anukampi -- di.t.thadhammikena ceva atthena samparaayikena caa''ti.
text.1471: [03] 125^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho raajaa maagadho  ajaatasattu vedehiputto catura"ngini.m sena.m sannayhitvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m  kosala.m abbhuyyaasi yena kaasi. assosi kho raajaa pasenadi  kosalo -- ``raajaa kira maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto catura"ngini.m  sena.m sannayhitvaa mama.m abbhuyyaato yena kaasii''ti. atha ^a^P1.0083^ea^  kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo catura"ngini.m sena.m sannayhitvaa  raajaana.m maagadha.m ajaatasattu.m vedehiputta.m paccuyyaasi yena kaasi. atha  kho raajaa ca maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto raajaa ca pasenadi  kosalo sa"ngaamesu.m. tasmi.m kho pana sa"ngaame raajaa maagadho  ajaatasattu vedehiputto raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m paraajesi. paraajito  ca raajaa pasenadi kosalo sakameva {sa"ngaamaa (ka0)} raajadhaani.m saavatthi.m paccuyyaasi  {paayaasi (sii0 pii0)}.
text.1472: [03] atha ^a^T1.0121^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya pavisi.msu. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya  caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --
text.1473: [03] ``idha, bhante, raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto  catura"ngini.m sena.m sannayhitvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m abbhuyyaasi  yena kaasi. assosi kho, bhante, raajaa pasenadi kosalo --  `raajaa ^a^V1.0101^ea^ kira maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto catura"ngini.m sena.m  sannayhitvaa mama.m abbhuyyaato yena kaasii'ti. atha kho, bhante, raajaa  pasenadi kosalo ^a^M1.0084^ea^ catura"ngini.m sena.m sannayhitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m  ajaatasattu.m vedehiputta.m paccuyyaasi yena kaasi. atha kho, bhante,  raajaa ca maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto raajaa ca pasenadi kosalo  sa"ngaamesu.m. tasmi.m kho pana, bhante, sa"ngaame raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu  vedehiputto raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m paraajesi. paraajito ca, bhante,  raajaa pasenadi kosalo sakameva raajadhaani.m saavatthi.m paccuyyaasii''ti.
text.1474: [03] ``raajaa, bhikkhave, maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto paapamitto  paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko; raajaa ca kho, bhikkhave, pasenadi kosalo  kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko. ajjeva {ajjata~nca (sii0  pii0), ajjeva.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0122^ea^,  raajaa pasenadi kosalo ima.m ratti.m dukkha.m seti paraajito''ti.  idamavoca...pe0...
text.1478: [03] 126^b^.^eb^ {ettha ``atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo catura"ngini.m sena.m  sannayhitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m ajaatasattu.m vedehiputta.m abbhuyyaasii''ti  aadinaa paa.thena bhavitabba.m. a.t.thakathaaya.m hi ``abbhuyyaasiiti paraajaye  garahappatto...pe0... vuttajayakaara.na.m sutvaa abhiuyyaasii''ti vutta.m} atha   kho raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto  catura"ngini.m ^a^P1.0084^ea^ sena.m sannayhitvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m  kosala.m abbhuyyaasi yena kaasi. assosi kho raajaa pasenadi  kosalo -- ``raajaa kira maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto catura"ngini.m  sena.m sannayhitvaa mama.m abbhuyyaato yena kaasii''ti. atha kho raajaa  pasenadi kosalo catura"ngini.m sena.m sannayhitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m  ajaatasattu.m vedehiputta.m paccuyyaasi yena kaasi. atha kho raajaa ca  maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto raajaa ca pasenadi kosalo sa"ngaamesu.m.  tasmi.m kho pana sa"ngaame raajaa pasenadi kosalo raajaana.m maagadha.m  ajaatasattu.m vedehiputta.m paraajesi, jiivaggaaha~nca na.m aggahesi. atha  kho ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa etadahosi -- ``ki~ncaapi kho  myaaya.m ^a^M1.0085^ea^ raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto adubbhantassa  dubbhati, atha ca pana me bhaagineyyo hoti. ya.mnuunaaha.m ra~n~no  maagadhassa ajaatasattuno vedehiputtassa sabba.m hatthikaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa  sabba.m ^a^V1.0102^ea^ assakaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa sabba.m rathakaaya.m  pariyaadiyitvaa sabba.m ^a^T1.0123^ea^ pattikaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa jiivantameva na.m  osajjeyya''nti {ossajjeyyanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.
text.1479: [03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo ra~n~no maagadhassa  ajaatasattuno vedehiputtassa sabba.m hatthikaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa sabba.m  assakaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa sabba.m rathakaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa sabba.m  pattikaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa jiivantameva na.m osajji {ossaji (sii0), ossajji  (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

text.1481: [03] ``idha ^a^P1.0085^ea^, bhante, raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu  vedehiputto catura"ngini.m sena.m sannayhitvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m  abbhuyyaasi yena kaasi. assosi kho, bhante, raajaa pasenadi  kosalo -- `raajaa kira maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto catura"ngini.m  sena.m sannayhitvaa mama.m abbhuyyaato yena kaasii'ti. atha kho, bhante,  raajaa pasenadi kosalo catura"ngini.m sena.m sannayhitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m  ajaatasattu.m vedehiputta.m paccuyyaasi yena kaasi. atha kho, bhante,  raajaa ca maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto raajaa ca pasenadi kosalo  sa"ngaamesu.m. tasmi.m kho pana, bhante, sa"ngaame raajaa pasenadi kosalo  raajaana.m maagadha.m ajaatasattu.m vedehiputta.m paraajesi, jiivaggaaha~nca na.m  aggahesi. atha kho, bhante, ra~n~no pasenadissa ^a^T1.0124^ea^ kosalassa  etadahosi -- `ki~ncaapi kho myaaya.m raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu  vedehiputto adubbhantassa dubbhati, atha ca pana me bhaagineyyo hoti.  ya.mnuunaaha.m ra~n~no maagadhassa ajaatasattuno vedehiputtassa sabba.m hatthikaaya.m  pariyaadiyitvaa sabba.m assakaaya.m sabba.m rathakaaya.m sabba.m pattikaaya.m  pariyaadiyitvaa jiivantameva na.m osajjeyya'''nti.
text.1482: [03] ``atha ^a^M1.0086^ea^ kho, bhante, raajaa pasenadi kosalo ra~n~no  maagadhassa ajaatasattuno vedehiputtassa sabba.m hatthikaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa  sabba.m assakaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa sabba.m rathakaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa  ^a^V1.0103^ea^ sabba.m pattikaaya.m pariyaadiyitvaa jiivantameva na.m osajjii''ti.  atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo  abhaasi --
text.1484: [22] yadaa ca~n~ne vilumpanti, so vilutto viluppati {vilumpati (sii0 pii0  ka0)}..
text.1485: [21] ``.thaana~nhi ma~n~nati baalo, yaava paapa.m na paccati.

text.1487: [21] ``hantaa labhati {labhati hantaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} hantaara.m, jetaara.m labhate jaya.m.
text.1491: [03] 127^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0125^ea^ ^a^P1.0086^ea^. atha kho  raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. atha kho a~n~nataro  puriso yena raajaa pasenadi kosalo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa upaka.n.nake aarocesi -- ``mallikaa,  deva, devii dhiitara.m vijaataa''ti. eva.m vutte, raajaa pasenadi kosalo  anattamano ahosi.
text.1492: [03] atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m anattamanata.m viditvaa  taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
text.1495: [21] ``tassaa ^a^V1.0104^ea^ yo jaayati poso, suuro hoti  disampati.
text.1498: [03] 128^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0087^ea^. ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``atthi nu kho, bhante, eko dhammo yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha  ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m samparaayika~ncaa''ti?
text.1499: [03] ``atthi kho, mahaaraaja, eko dhammo yo ubho atthe  samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m samparaayika~ncaa''ti.
text.1500: [03] ``katamo ^a^T1.0126^ea^ pana, bhante, eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe  samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m samparaayika~ncaa''ti?
text.1501: [03] ``appamaado kho, mahaaraaja, eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe  samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m samparaayika~ncaati.  seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, yaani kaanici ja"ngalaana.m {ja"ngamaana.m (sii0 pii0)} paa.naana.m padajaataani,  sabbaani taani hatthipade samodhaana.m gacchanti, hatthipada.m tesa.m  aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m mahantattena; evameva kho, mahaaraaja,  appamaado eko dhammo, yo ubho ^a^P1.0087^ea^ atthe  samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m samparaayika~ncaa''ti.  idamavoca...pe0...
text.1506: [21] ``di.t.the ^a^V1.0105^ea^ dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho  samparaayiko.
text.1509: [03] 129^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m ^a^T1.0127^ea^, bhante,  rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi --  `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, so ca kho kalyaa.namittassa  kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa, no paapamittassa no  paapasahaayassa no paapasampava"nkassaa'''ti.
text.1510: [03] ``evameta.m, mahaaraaja, evameta.m, mahaaraaja! svaakkhaato ^a^M1.0088^ea^,  mahaaraaja, mayaa dhammo. so ca kho kalyaa.namittassa  kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa, no paapamittassa no  paapasahaayassa no paapasampava"nkassaati.
text.1511: [03] ``ekamidaaha.m, mahaaraaja, samaya.m sakkesu viharaami nagaraka.m naama  sakyaana.m nigamo. atha kho, mahaaraaja, aanando bhikkhu yenaaha.m  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho, mahaaraaja, aanando bhikkhu ma.m etadavoca --  `upa.d.dhamida.m, bhante, brahmacariyassa -- yadida.m kalyaa.namittataa  kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa'''ti.
text.1512: [03] ``eva.m vuttaaha.m, mahaaraaja, aananda.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m -- `maa  heva.m, aananda, maa heva.m, aananda! sakalameva hida.m, aananda,  brahmacariya.m -- yadida.m kalyaa.namittataa ^a^P1.0088^ea^  kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa. kalyaa.namittasseta.m, aananda,  bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa ariya.m  a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavessati ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarissati'''.
text.1513: [03] ``katha~nca, aananda, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo  kalyaa.nasampava"nko ^a^T1.0128^ea^ ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m  magga.m bahuliikaroti? idhaananda, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti ^a^V1.0106^ea^  vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m,  sammaasa"nkappa.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaavaaca.m bhaaveti...pe0...  sammaakammanta.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaaaajiiva.m bhaaveti...pe0...  sammaavaayaama.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasati.m bhaaveti...pe0...  sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m  vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, aananda, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto  kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti,  ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti. tadaminaapeta.m, aananda,  pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa sakalamevida.m brahmacariya.m -- yadida.m  kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa''ti.
text.1514: [03] ``mama~nhi, aananda, kalyaa.namitta.m aagamma jaatidhammaa sattaa  jaatiyaa parimuccanti, jaraadhammaa sattaa jaraaya parimuccanti,  byaadhidhammaa sattaa byaadhito parimuccanti, mara.nadhammaa sattaa mara.nena  parimuccanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa sattaa  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasehi parimuccanti. iminaa kho eta.m,  aananda, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa sakalamevida.m ^a^M1.0089^ea^ brahmacariya.m --  yadida.m kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa''ti.
text.1515: [03] ``tasmaatiha te, mahaaraaja, eva.m sikkhitabba.m --  `kalyaa.namitto bhavissaami kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko'ti.  eva~nhi te ^a^T1.0129^ea^, mahaaraaja, sikkhitabba.m.
text.1516: [03] ``kalyaa.namittassa te, mahaaraaja, kalyaa.nasahaayassa  kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa aya.m eko ^a^P1.0089^ea^ dhammo upanissaaya  vihaatabbo -- appamaado kusalesu dhammesu.
text.1517: [03] ``appamattassa te, mahaaraaja, viharato appamaada.m upanissaaya,  itthaagaarassa anuyantassa eva.m bhavissati -- `raajaa kho appamatto  viharati, appamaada.m upanissaaya. handa, mayampi appamattaa viharaama,  appamaada.m upanissaayaa'''ti.
text.1518: [03] ``appamattassa ^a^V1.0107^ea^ te, mahaaraaja, viharato appamaada.m  upanissaaya, khattiyaanampi anuyantaana.m eva.m bhavissati -- `raajaa  kho appamatto viharati appamaada.m upanissaaya. handa, mayampi  appamattaa viharaama, appamaada.m upanissaayaa'''ti.
text.1519: [03] ``appamattassa te, mahaaraaja, viharato appamaada.m upanissaaya,  balakaayassapi eva.m bhavissati -- `raajaa kho appamatto viharati  appamaada.m upanissaaya. handa, mayampi appamattaa viharaama, appamaada.m  upanissaayaa'''ti.
text.1520: [03] ``appamattassa te, mahaaraaja, viharato appamaada.m upanissaaya,  negamajaanapadassapi eva.m bhavissati -- `raajaa kho appamatto  viharati, appamaada.m upanissaaya. handa, mayampi appamattaa viharaama,  appamaada.m upanissaayaa'''ti?
text.1521: [03] ``appamattassa te, mahaaraaja, viharato appamaada.m upanissaaya,  attaapi gutto rakkhito bhavissati -- itthaagaarampi gutta.m rakkhita.m  bhavissati, kosako.t.thaagaarampi gutta.m rakkhita.m bhavissatii''ti.  idamavoca...pe0...
text.1525: [27] di.t.the ^a^M1.0090^ea^ dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho  samparaayiko.
text.1528: [03] 130^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho raajaa pasenadi  kosalo divaa divassa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho  raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``handa, kuto nu tva.m,  mahaaraaja, aagacchasi divaa divassaa''ti?
text.1529: [01] ``idha, bhante, saavatthiya.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala"nkato.  tamaha.m aputtaka.m saapateyya.m raajantepura.m atiharitvaa aagacchaami.  asiiti, bhante, satasahassaani hira~n~nasseva, ko pana ^a^P1.0090^ea^  vaado ruupiyassa ^a^V1.0108^ea^! tassa kho pana, bhante, se.t.thissa  gahapatissa evaruupo bhattabhogo ahosi -- ka.naajaka.m bhu~njati  bila"ngadutiya.m. evaruupo vatthabhogo ahosi -- saa.na.m dhaareti  tipakkhavasana.m. evaruupo yaanabhogo ahosi -- jajjararathakena yaati  pa.n.nachattakena dhaariyamaanenaa''ti.
text.1530: [03] ``evameta.m, mahaaraaja, evameta.m, mahaaraaja! asappuriso kho,  mahaaraaja, u.laare bhoge labhitvaa nevattaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na  maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti, na puttadaara.m sukheti pii.neti, na  daasakammakaraporise ^a^T1.0131^ea^ sukheti pii.neti, na mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti,  na sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m  sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m. tassa te bhoge eva.m sammaa  aparibhu~njiyamaane {aparibhu~njamaano (sabbattha)} raajaano vaa haranti coraa vaa haranti aggi vaa  .dahati udaka.m vaa vahati appiyaa vaa daayaadaa haranti. eva.msa te {eva.m sante  (sii0 pii0)},  mahaaraaja, bhogaa sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaanaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, no  paribhoga.m.
text.1531: [03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, amanussa.t.thaane pokkhara.nii acchodakaa  siitodakaa saatodakaa setodakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa. ta.m jano neva  hareyya na piveyya na nahaayeyya na yathaapaccaya.m vaa kareyya. eva~nhi  ta.m, mahaaraaja, udaka.m sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaana.m {aparibhu~njamaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} parikkhaya.m gaccheyya  ^a^M1.0091^ea^, no paribhoga.m. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, asappuriso u.laare  bhoge labhitvaa nevattaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na maataapitaro sukheti  pii.neti, na puttadaara.m sukheti pii.neti, na daasakammakaraporise sukheti  pii.neti, na mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti, na sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m  dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m. tassa  te bhoge eva.m sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaane raajaano vaa haranti coraa vaa  haranti aggi vaa .dahati udaka.m vaa vahati appiyaa vaa daayaadaa  haranti. eva.msa te {eva.m sante (sii0 pii0)}, mahaaraaja, bhogaa sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaanaa  parikkhaya.m gacchanti, no paribhoga.m.
text.1532: [01] ``sappuriso ca kho, mahaaraaja, u.laare bhoge labhitvaa  attaana.m sukheti pii.neti, maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti, puttadaara.m  sukheti pii.neti, daasakammakaraporise sukheti pii.neti, mittaamacce  sukheti pii.neti, sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti  sovaggika.m ^a^T1.0132^ea^ sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m. tassa te bhoge eva.m sammaa  paribhu~njiyamaane neva raajaano haranti ^a^V1.0109^ea^ ^a^P1.0091^ea^, na  coraa haranti, na aggi .dahati, na udaka.m vahati, na appiyaa daayaadaa  haranti. eva.msa te, mahaaraaja, bhogaa sammaa paribhu~njiyamaanaa paribhoga.m  gacchanti, no parikkhaya.m.
text.1533: [03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure  pokkhara.nii acchodakaa siitodakaa saatodakaa setodakaa supatitthaa  rama.niiyaa. ta~nca udaka.m jano hareyyapi piveyyapi nahaayeyyapi  yathaapaccayampi kareyya. eva~nhi ta.m, mahaaraaja, udaka.m sammaa  paribhu~njiyamaana.m paribhoga.m gaccheyya, no parikkhaya.m. evameva kho,  mahaaraaja, sappuriso u.laare bhoge labhitvaa attaana.m sukheti pii.neti,  maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti, puttadaara.m sukheti pii.neti,  daasakammakaraporise sukheti pii.neti, mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti,  sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m  saggasa.mvattanika.m. tassa te bhoge eva.m sammaa paribhu~njiyamaane neva  raajaano haranti, na coraa haranti, na aggi .dahati, na udaka.m vahati,  na appiyaa daayaadaa haranti. eva.msa te, mahaaraaja, bhogaa sammaa  paribhu~njiyamaanaa paribhoga.m gacchanti, no parikkhaya''nti.
text.1543: [03] 131^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T1.0133^ea^ kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo divaa  divassa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V1.0110^ea^ ekamanta.m  nisinna.m kho raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``handa,  kuto nu tva.m, mahaaraaja, aagacchasi divaa divassaa''ti?
text.1544: [03] ``idha, bhante, saavatthiya.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala"nkato. tamaha.m  aputtaka.m saapateyya.m raajantepura.m atiharitvaa aagacchaami. sata.m, bhante,  satasahassaani hira~n~nasseva, ko pana vaado ruupiyassa! tassa kho  pana, bhante, se.t.thissa gahapatissa evaruupo bhattabhogo ahosi --  ka.naajaka.m bhu~njati bila"ngadutiya.m. evaruupo vatthabhogo ahosi --  saa.na.m dhaareti tipakkhavasana.m ^a^P1.0092^ea^. evaruupo yaanabhogo  ahosi -- jajjararathakena yaati pa.n.nachattakena dhaariyamaanenaa''ti.
text.1545: [03] ``evameta.m, mahaaraaja, evameta.m, mahaaraaja! bhuutapubba.m so,  mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati taggarasikhi.m naama paccekasambuddha.m pi.n.dapaatena  pa.tipaadesi. `detha sama.nassa pi.n.da'nti vatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.  datvaa ca pana pacchaa vippa.tisaarii ahosi -- `varameta.m pi.n.dapaata.m  daasaa vaa kammakaraa vaa bhu~njeyyu'nti. bhaatu ca pana ekaputtaka.m  saapateyyassa kaara.naa jiivitaa voropesi.
text.1546: [03] ``ya.m kho so, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati taggarasikhi.m  paccekasambuddha.m pi.n.dapaatena pa.tipaadesi, tassa kammassa vipaakena  sattakkhattu.m sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajji. tasseva ^a^T1.0134^ea^ kammassa  vipaakaavasesena imissaayeva saavatthiyaa ^a^M1.0093^ea^ sattakkhattu.m se.t.thitta.m  kaaresi. ya.m kho so, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati datvaa pacchaa  vippa.tisaarii ahosi -- `varameta.m pi.n.dapaata.m daasaa vaa kammakaraa vaa  bhu~njeyyu'nti, tassa kammassa vipaakena naassu.laaraaya bhattabhogaaya citta.m  namati, naassu.laaraaya vatthabhogaaya citta.m namati, naassu.laaraaya  yaanabhogaaya citta.m namati, naassu.laaraana.m pa~ncanna.m kaamagu.naana.m bhogaaya  citta.m namati. ya.m kho so, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati bhaatu ca pana  ekaputtaka.m saapateyyassa kaara.naa jiivitaa voropesi, tassa kammassa  vipaakena bahuuni vassaani bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani  bahuuni vassasatasahassaani niraye paccittha. tasseva kammassa  vipaakaavasesena ida.m sattama.m aputtaka.m saapateyya.m raajakosa.m paveseti.  tassa kho, mahaaraaja, se.t.thissa gahapatissa puraa.na~nca pu~n~na.m parikkhii.na.m,  nava~nca pu~n~na.m anupacita.m. ajja pana, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati  mahaaroruve niraye paccatii''ti ^a^V1.0111^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante, se.t.thi  gahapati mahaaroruva.m niraya.m upapanno''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P1.0093^ea^,  mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati mahaaroruva.m niraya.m upapanno''ti.  idamavoca...pe0....

text.1562: [03] 132^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0136^ea^ ^a^V1.0112^ea^ ^a^M1.0094^ea^. atha kho  raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho  raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``cattaarome, mahaaraaja,  puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro?  tamotamaparaayano, tamojotiparaayano, jotitamaparaayano,  jotijotiparaayano''.
text.1563: [03] ``katha~nca, mahaaraaja puggalo tamotamaparaayano hoti? idha,  mahaaraaja, ekacco puggalo niice kule paccaajaato hoti, ca.n.daalakule  vaa venakule {ve.nakule (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa nesaadakule vaa rathakaarakule vaa pukkusakule vaa dalidde  appannapaanabhojane kasiravuttike ^a^P1.0094^ea^, yattha kasirena  ghaasacchaado labbhati. so ca hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko  oko.timako bavhaabaadho {bahvaabaadho (ka0)} kaa.no vaa ku.nii vaa kha~njo vaa pakkhahato  vaa, na laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa  seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya  duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m  caritvaa vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.
text.1564: [03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja ^a^T1.0137^ea^, puriso andhakaaraa vaa andhakaara.m  gaccheyya, tamaa vaa tama.m gaccheyya, lohitamalaa vaa lohitamala.m  gaccheyya. tathuupamaaha.m, mahaaraaja, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. eva.m kho,  mahaaraaja, puggalo tamotamaparaayano hoti.
text.1565: [03] ``katha~nca, mahaaraaja, puggalo tamojotiparaayano hoti?  idha, mahaaraaja, ekacco puggalo niice kule paccaajaato hoti,  ca.n.daalakule vaa venakule vaa nesaadakule vaa rathakaarakule vaa pukkusakule  vaa dalidde appannapaanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghaasacchaado  labbhati. so ca kho hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko ^a^M1.0095^ea^  oko.timako bavhaabaadho, kaa.no vaa ^a^V1.0113^ea^ ku.nii vaa kha~njo vaa  pakkhahato vaa, na laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa  maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena sucarita.m  carati, vaacaaya sucarita.m carati, manasaa sucarita.m carati. so  kaayena sucarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya sucarita.m caritvaa manasaa sucarita.m  caritvaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati.
text.1566: [03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, puriso pathaviyaa vaa palla"nka.m  aaroheyya, palla"nkaa vaa assapi.t.thi.m aaroheyya, assapi.t.thiyaa vaa  hatthikkhandha.m aaroheyya, hatthikkhandhaa vaa paasaada.m aaroheyya.  tathuupamaaha.m, mahaaraaja, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja,  puggalo tamojotiparaayano hoti.
text.1567: [01] ``katha~nca, mahaaraaja, puggalo jotitamaparaayano hoti?  idha ^a^T1.0138^ea^, mahaaraaja, ekacco puggalo ucce kule paccaajaato hoti,  khattiyamahaasaalakule vaa braahma.namahaasaalakule vaa gahapatimahaasaalakule  vaa, a.d.dhe mahaddhane mahaabhoge pahuutajaataruuparajate ^a^P1.0095^ea^  pahuutavittuupakara.ne pahuutadhanadha~n~ne. so ca hoti abhiruupo dassaniiyo  paasaadiko, paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato, laabhii annassa  paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa.  so kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa  duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya duccarita.m  caritvaa manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m  duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.
text.1568: [03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, puriso paasaadaa vaa hatthikkhandha.m  oroheyya, hatthikkhandhaa vaa assapi.t.thi.m oroheyya, assapi.t.thiyaa vaa  palla"nka.m oroheyya, palla"nkaa vaa pathavi.m oroheyya, pathaviyaa vaa  andhakaara.m paviseyya. tathuupamaaha.m, mahaaraaja, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.  eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, puggalo jotitamaparaayano hoti.
text.1569: [03] ``katha~nca, mahaaraaja, puggalo jotijotiparaayano hoti?  idha, mahaaraaja, ekacco puggalo ucce kule paccaajaato hoti,  khattiyamahaasaalakule vaa braahma.namahaasaalakule vaa gahapatimahaasaalakule  ^a^M1.0096^ea^ vaa, a.d.dhe mahaddhane mahaabhoge pahuutajaataruuparajate  pahuutavittuupakara.ne ^a^T1.0139^ea^ pahuutadhanadha~n~ne. so ca hoti abhiruupo dassaniiyo  paasaadiko, paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato ^a^V1.0114^ea^, laabhii  annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa  seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena sucarita.m carati, vaacaaya  sucarita.m carati, manasaa sucarita.m carati. so kaayena sucarita.m  caritvaa vaacaaya sucarita.m caritvaa manasaa sucarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati.
text.1570: [03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, puriso palla"nkaa vaa palla"nka.m sa"nkameyya,  assapi.t.thiyaa vaa assapi.t.thi.m sa"nkameyya, hatthikkhandhaa vaa hatthikkhandha.m  sa"nkameyya, paasaadaa vaa paasaada.m sa"nkameyya. tathuupamaaha.m, mahaaraaja, ima.m  puggala.m vadaami. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, puggalo jotijotiparaayano  hoti. ime ^a^P1.0096^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, cattaaro puggalaa santo  sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. idamavoca...pe0...

text.1600: [03] 133^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0141^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho  raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhagavaa ^a^P1.0097^ea^ etadavoca --  ``handa, kuto nu tva.m, mahaaraaja, aagacchasi divaadivassaa''ti?
text.1601: [03] ``ayyikaa ^a^V1.0116^ea^ me, bhante, kaala"nkataa ji.n.naa vu.d.dhaa  mahallikaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa viisavassasatikaa jaatiyaa.  ayyikaa kho pana me, bhante, piyaa hoti manaapaa. hatthiratanena  cepaaha.m, bhante, labheyya.m `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti,  hatthiratanampaaha.m dadeyya.m -- `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti.  assaratanena cepaaha.m, bhante, labheyya.m `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti,  assaratanampaaha.m dadeyya.m -- `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti.  gaamavarena cepaaha.m bhante, labheyya.m `maa me ayyikaa  kaalamakaasii'ti, gaamavarampaaha.m dadeyya.m -- `maa me ayyikaa  kaalamakaasii'ti. janapadapadesena {janapadena (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} cepaaha.m, bhante, labheyya.m  ^a^M1.0098^ea^ `maa me  ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti, janapadapadesampaaha.m dadeyya.m -- `maa me  ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti. `sabbe sattaa, mahaaraaja, mara.nadhammaa  mara.napariyosaanaa mara.na.m anatiitaa'ti. `acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m,  bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- sabbe sattaa mara.nadhammaa  mara.napariyosaanaa mara.na.m anatiitaa'''ti.
text.1602: [03] ``evameta.m, mahaaraaja, evameta.m, mahaaraaja! sabbe sattaa  mara.nadhammaa ^a^T1.0142^ea^ mara.napariyosaanaa mara.na.m anatiitaa. seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja,  yaani kaanici kumbhakaarabhaajanaani aamakaani ceva pakkaani ca  sabbaani taani bhedanadhammaani bhedanapariyosaanaani bhedana.m anatiitaani;  evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sabbe sattaa mara.nadhammaa mara.napariyosaanaa  mara.na.m anatiitaa''ti. idamavoca...pe0...
text.1609: [03] 134^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P1.0098^ea^. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^V1.0117^ea^  -- ``kati nu kho, bhante, lokassa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti  ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraayaa''ti? ``tayo kho, mahaaraaja,  lokassa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti ahitaaya dukkhaaya  aphaasuvihaaraaya. katame tayo? lobho kho, mahaaraaja, lokassa  dhammo, uppajjamaano uppajjati ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya.  doso ^a^T1.0143^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, lokassa dhammo, uppajjamaano uppajjati  ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya. moho kho, mahaaraaja, lokassa  dhammo, uppajjamaano uppajjati ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya.  ime kho, mahaaraaja, tayo lokassa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti  ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraayaa''ti. idamavoca...pe0...
text.1610: [21] ``lobho ^a^M1.0099^ea^ doso ca moho ca, purisa.m paapacetasa.m.
text.1613: [03] 135^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kattha nu kho,  bhante, daana.m daatabba''nti? ``yattha kho, mahaaraaja, citta.m  pasiidatii''ti. ``kattha pana, bhante, dinna.m mahapphala''nti?  ``a~n~na.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, kattha daana.m daatabba.m, a~n~na.m paneta.m kattha  dinna.m mahapphalanti? siilavato kho, mahaaraaja, dinna.m mahapphala.m, no  tathaa dussiile. tena hi, mahaaraaja, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami.  yathaa, te khameyya, tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi,  mahaaraaja, idha tyassa yuddha.m paccupa.t.thita.m sa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho {samuupabbuu.lho  (sii0), samupabbu.lho (pii0)}. atha  aagaccheyya khattiyakumaaro asikkhito akatahattho akatayoggo  akatuupaasano ^a^P1.0099^ea^ bhiiru chambhii utraasii palaayii.  bhareyyaasi ta.m purisa.m, attho ca te taadisena purisenaa''ti?  ``naaha.m, bhante, bhareyya.m ta.m purisa.m, na ca me attho taadisena  purisenaa''ti. ``atha aagaccheyya braahma.nakumaaro  asikkhito...pe0... atha aagaccheyya vessakumaaro  asikkhito...pe0... atha aagaccheyya suddakumaaro  asikkhito...pe0... na ca me attho taadisena purisenaa''ti.
text.1614: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha tyassa yuddha.m paccupa.t.thita.m  sa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho. atha aagaccheyya ^a^V1.0118^ea^ khattiyakumaaro  susikkhito katahattho katayoggo katuupaasano abhiiru acchambhii  anutraasii apalaayii. bhareyyaasi ta.m purisa.m, attho ca te taadisena  purisenaa''ti? ``bhareyyaaha.m, bhante ^a^T1.0144^ea^, ta.m purisa.m, attho ca me  taadisena purisenaa''ti. ``atha aagaccheyya braahma.nakumaaro...pe0...  atha aagaccheyya vessakumaaro...pe0... atha aagaccheyya suddakumaaro  susikkhito katahattho katayoggo katuupaasano abhiiru acchambhii  anutraasii apalaayii. bhareyyaasi ta.m purisa.m, attho ca te taadisena  purisenaa''ti? ``bhareyyaaha.m, bhante, ta.m purisa.m, attho ca me  taadisena purisenaa''ti.
text.1615: [03] ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yasmaa kasmaa cepi {yasmaa cepi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  ka0)} kulaa agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca hoti pa~nca"ngavippahiino  pa~nca"ngasamannaagato, tasmi.m ^a^M1.0100^ea^ dinna.m mahapphala.m hoti. katamaani  pa~nca"ngaani pahiinaani honti? kaamacchando pahiino hoti, byaapaado  pahiino hoti, thinamiddha.m pahiina.m hoti, uddhaccakukkucca.m pahiina.m hoti,  vicikicchaa pahiinaa hoti. imaani pa~nca"ngaani pahiinaani honti.  katamehi pa~ncaha"ngehi ^a^T1.0145^ea^ samannaagato hoti? asekkhena siilakkhandhena  samannaagato hoti, asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti,  asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato ^a^P1.0100^ea^ hoti,  asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena  vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti. imehi pa~ncaha"ngehi  samannaagato hoti. iti pa~nca"ngavippahiine pa~nca"ngasamannaagate dinna.m  mahapphala''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa --
text.1616: [21] ``issatta.m {issattha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} balaviiriya~nca {balaviriya~nca  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, yasmi.m vijjetha maa.nave.

text.1632: [03] 136^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0101^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinna.m  kho raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``handa, kuto nu  tva.m, mahaaraaja, aagacchasi divaa divassaa''ti? ``yaani taani,  bhante, ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m issariyamadamattaana.m  kaamagedhapariyu.t.thitaana.m janapadatthaavariyappattaana.m mahanta.m pathavima.n.dala.m  abhivijiya ajjhaavasantaana.m raajakara.niiyaani bhavanti, tesu khvaaha.m,  etarahi ussukkamaapanno''ti.
text.1633: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha te puriso aagaccheyya  ^a^P1.0101^ea^ puratthimaaya disaaya saddhaayiko paccayiko. so  ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `yagghe, mahaaraaja, jaaneyyaasi, aha.m  aagacchaami puratthimaaya disaaya. tatthaddasa.m mahanta.m pabbata.m abbhasama.m  sabbe paa.ne nippothento aagacchati. ya.m te, mahaaraaja, kara.niiya.m, ta.m  karohii'ti. atha dutiyo puriso aagaccheyya pacchimaaya  disaaya...pe0... atha tatiyo puriso aagaccheyya uttaraaya  disaaya...pe0... atha catuttho puriso aagaccheyya dakkhi.naaya disaaya  saddhaayiko paccayiko. so ta.m ^a^T1.0147^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `yagghe  mahaaraaja, jaaneyyaasi, aha.m aagacchaami ^a^V1.0120^ea^ dakkhi.naaya disaaya.  tatthaddasa.m mahanta.m pabbata.m abbhasama.m sabbe paa.ne nippothento  aagacchati. ya.m te, mahaaraaja, kara.niiya.m ta.m karohii'ti. evaruupe te,  mahaaraaja, mahati mahabbhaye samuppanne daaru.ne manussakkhaye {manussakaaye (ka0)} dullabhe  manussatte kimassa kara.niiya''nti?
text.1634: [03] ``evaruupe me, bhante, mahati mahabbhaye samuppanne daaru.ne  manussakkhaye dullabhe manussatte kimassa kara.niiya.m a~n~natra  dhammacariyaaya a~n~natra samacariyaaya a~n~natra kusalakiriyaaya a~n~natra  pu~n~nakiriyaayaa''ti?
text.1635: [03] ``aarocemi kho te, mahaaraaja, pa.tivedemi kho te, mahaaraaja,  adhivattati kho ta.m, mahaaraaja, jaraamara.na.m. adhivattamaane ce te,  mahaaraaja, jaraamara.ne kimassa kara.niiya''nti? ``adhivattamaane ca  me, bhante, jaraamara.ne kimassa kara.niiya.m a~n~natra dhammacariyaaya  samacariyaaya kusalakiriyaaya pu~n~nakiriyaaya? yaani taani, bhante,  ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m issariyamadamattaana.m ^a^M1.0102^ea^  kaamagedhapariyu.t.thitaana.m janapadatthaavariyappattaana.m mahanta.m pathavima.n.dala.m  abhivijiya ajjhaavasantaana.m hatthiyuddhaani bhavanti; tesampi, bhante,  hatthiyuddhaana.m natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne.  yaanipi taani, bhante, ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m...pe0...  ajjhaavasantaana.m assayuddhaani bhavanti...pe0... rathayuddhaani  bhavanti ^a^T1.0148^ea^ ...pe0... pattiyuddhaani bhavanti; tesampi ^a^P1.0102^ea^,  bhante, pattiyuddhaana.m natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne.  santi kho pana, bhante, imasmi.m raajakule mantino mahaamattaa, ye  pahonti {yesa.m honti (ka0)} aagate paccatthike mantehi bhedayitu.m. tesampi, bhante,  mantayuddhaana.m natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne.  sa.mvijjati kho pana, bhante, imasmi.m raajakule pahuuta.m hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m  bhuumigata~nceva vehaasa.t.tha~nca, yena maya.m pahoma aagate paccatthike dhanena  upalaapetu.m. tesampi, bhante, dhanayuddhaana.m natthi gati natthi visayo  adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne. adhivattamaane ca me, bhante, jaraamara.ne  kimassa kara.niiya.m a~n~natra dhammacariyaaya samacariyaaya kusalakiriyaaya  pu~n~nakiriyaayaa''ti?

text.1835: [03] 156^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati  himavantapadese {himavantapasse (sii0)} ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa  pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso ^a^T1.0170^ea^ parivitakko udapaadi -- ``sakkaa nu kho  rajja.m kaaretu.m ahana.m aghaataya.m ajina.m ajaapaya.m asoca.m asocaapaya.m  dhammenaa''ti?

text.1850: [03] 157^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0172^ea^ ^a^V1.0139^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa  sakkesu viharati silaavatiya.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa  bhikkhuu bhagavato aviduure appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharanti.  atha kho maaro paapimaa braahma.nava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa mahantena  ja.ta.n.duvena ajinakkhipanivattho ji.n.no gopaanasiva"nko  ghurughurupassaasii udumbarada.n.da.m gahetvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``daharaa bhavanto ^a^M1.0119^ea^  pabbajitaa susuu kaa.lakesaa bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa  anikkii.litaavino kaamesu. bhu~njantu bhavanto maanusake kaame. maa  sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavitthaa''ti. ``na kho maya.m,  braahma.na, sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavaama. kaalika~nca kho  maya.m, braahma.na, hitvaa sandi.t.thika.m anudhaavaama. kaalikaa hi, braahma.na,  kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo.  sandi.t.thiko aya.m dhammo akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko  paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti. eva.m ^a^P1.0118^ea^ vutte, maaro  paapimaa siisa.m okampetvaa jivha.m nillaaletvaa tivisaakha.m nalaa.te  nalaa.tika.m vu.t.thaapetvaa da.n.damolubbha pakkaami.
text.1851: [01] atha ^a^T1.0173^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha maya.m, bhante,  bhagavato aviduure appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharaama. atha kho,  bhante, a~n~nataro braahma.no mahantena ja.ta.n.duvena ajinakkhipanivattho  ji.n.no gopaanasiva"nko ghurughurupassaasii udumbarada.n.da.m gahetvaa yena maya.m  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa amhe etadavoca -- `daharaa bhavanto  pabbajitaa susuu kaa.lakesaa bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa  anikkii.litaavino kaamesu. bhu~njantu bhavanto maanusake kaame. maa  sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavitthaa'ti. eva.m vutte, maya.m, bhante,  ta.m braahma.na.m etadavocumha -- `na kho maya.m, braahma.na, sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa  kaalika.m anudhaavaama. kaalika~nca kho maya.m, braahma.na, hitvaa  sandi.t.thika.m anudhaavaama. kaalikaa hi, braahma.na, kaamaa ^a^V1.0140^ea^ vuttaa  bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. sandi.t.thiko  aya.m dhammo akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo  vi~n~nuuhii'ti. eva.m vutte, bhante, so braahma.no siisa.m okampetvaa jivha.m  nillaaletvaa tivisaakha.m nalaa.te nalaa.tika.m vu.t.thaapetvaa da.n.damolubbha  pakkanto''ti.

text.1858: [03] 158^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P1.0119^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu  viharati silaavatiya.m. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa samiddhi  bhagavato aviduure appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharati. atha kho  aayasmato samiddhissa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso  parivitakko udapaadi -- ``laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me  satthaa araha.m sammaasambuddho. laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yvaaha.m  eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajito. laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata  me, yassa me sabrahmacaarino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa''ti. atha kho  maaro paapimaa aayasmato samiddhissa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya  yenaayasmaa samiddhi tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmato  samiddhissa aviduure mahanta.m bhayabherava.m saddamakaasi, apissuda.m pathavii  ma~n~ne undriiyati.
text.1859: [03] atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno ^a^T1.0175^ea^ aayasmaa samiddhi bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante,  bhagavato aviduure appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharaami. tassa  mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa ^a^V1.0141^ea^ pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso  parivitakko udapaadi -- `laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me  satthaa araha.m sammaasambuddho. laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yvaaha.m  eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajito. laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata  me, yassa me sabrahmacaarino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa'ti. tassa  mayha.m, bhante, aviduure mahaabhayabheravasaddo ahosi, apissuda.m pathavii  ma~n~ne undriiyatii''ti.
text.1860: [03] ``nesaa, samiddhi, pathavii undriiyati. maaro eso paapimaa  tuyha.m vicakkhukammaaya aagato. gaccha tva.m, samiddhi, tattheva  appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharaahii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho  aayasmaa samiddhi bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ^a^M1.0121^ea^ ^a^P1.0120^ea^  u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.  dutiyampi kho aayasmaa samiddhi tattheva appamatto aataapii pahitatto  vihaasi. dutiyampi kho aayasmato samiddhissa rahogatassa  pa.tisalliinassa...pe0... dutiyampi kho maaro paapimaa aayasmato  samiddhissa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya...pe0... apissuda.m pathavii  ma~n~ne undriiyati. atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi maara.m ^a^T1.0176^ea^ paapimanta.m  gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

text.1866: [03] 159^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe  viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa  godhiko isigilipasse viharati kaa.lasilaaya.m. atha kho aayasmaa  godhiko appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m  phusi. atha kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa saamayikaaya  cetovimuttiyaa parihaayi ^a^V1.0142^ea^. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa  godhiko appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m  phusi. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa saamayikaaya  cetovimuttiyaa parihaayi. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa godhiko  appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m phusi.  tatiyampi kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa...pe0... parihaayi.  catutthampi kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto...pe0... vimutti.m phusi ^a^T1.0177^ea^.  catutthampi kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa...pe0... parihaayi.  pa~ncamampi ^a^P1.0121^ea^ kho aayasmaa godhiko...pe0...  cetovimutti.m phusi. pa~ncamampi kho aayasmaa...pe0... vimuttiyaa  parihaayi. cha.t.thampi kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto aataapii  pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m phusi. cha.t.thampi kho  aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa saamayikaaya cetovimuttiyaa parihaayi.  sattamampi ^a^M1.0122^ea^ kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto aataapii  pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m phusi.

text.2212: [03] atha kho aayasmato mahaakassapassa etadahosi -- ``kaha.m nu  kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii''ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa  mahaakassapo bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa...pe0... disvaana --  seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva -- jetavane ^a^P1.0145^ea^  antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho  aayasmaa mahaakassapo dakkhi.na.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno upari  vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.
text.2213: [03] atha ^a^T1.0213^ea^ kho aayasmato mahaakappinassa etadahosi -- ``kaha.m nu  kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii''ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa  mahaakappino bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa...pe0... tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m.  disvaana -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva --  jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa  mahaakappino pacchima.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m  palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.

text.2221: [03] atha ^a^T1.0214^ea^ ^a^M1.0148^ea^ kho bhagavaa ta.m brahmaana.m sa.mvejetvaa -- seyyathaapi  naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m  sami~njeyya evameva -- tasmi.m brahmaloke antarahito jetavane  paaturahosi. atha kho so brahmaa a~n~natara.m brahmapaarisajja.m aamantesi  -- ``ehi tva.m, maarisa, yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkama;  upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m eva.m vadehi -- `atthi nu  kho, maarisa moggallaana, a~n~nepi tassa bhagavato saavakaa  eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa ^a^P1.0146^ea^; seyyathaapi bhava.m  moggallaano kassapo kappino anuruddho'''ti? ``eva.m, maarisaa''ti  kho so brahmapaarisajjo tassa brahmuno pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa  mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m  etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, maarisa moggallaana, a~n~nepi tassa  bhagavato saavakaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa; seyyathaapi bhava.m  moggallaano kassapo kappino anuruddho''ti? atha kho aayasmaa  mahaamoggallaano ta.m brahmapaarisajja.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

text.2229: [03] 177^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena  bhagavaa divaavihaaragato hoti pa.tisalliino. atha kho subrahmaa ca  paccekabrahmaa suddhaavaaso ^a^M1.0149^ea^ ca paccekabrahmaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pacceka.m dvaarabaaha.m {paccekadvaarabaaha.m (pii0 ka0)} upanissaaya a.t.tha.msu.  atha kho subrahmaa paccekabrahmaa suddhaavaasa.m paccekabrahmaana.m etadavoca --  ``akaalo kho taava, maarisa, bhagavanta.m payirupaasitu.m;  divaavihaaragato bhagavaa pa.tisalliino ca. asuko ca brahmaloko iddho  ceva phiito ca, brahmaa ca tatra pamaadavihaara.m viharati. aayaama,  maarisa, yena so brahmaloko tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m  brahmaana.m sa.mvejeyyaamaa''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P1.0147^ea^, maarisaa''ti  kho suddhaavaaso paccekabrahmaa subrahmuno paccekabrahmuno paccassosi.
text.2230: [03] atha kho subrahmaa ca paccekabrahmaa ^a^T1.0216^ea^ suddhaavaaso ca paccekabrahmaa --  seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva -- bhagavato purato  antarahitaa tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahesu.m. addasaa kho so brahmaa te  brahmaano duuratova aagacchante. disvaana te brahmaano etadavoca --  ``handa kuto nu tumhe, maarisaa, aagacchathaa''ti? ``aagataa kho  maya.m, maarisa, amha tassa bhagavato ^a^V1.0174^ea^ santikaa arahato  sammaasambuddhassa. gaccheyyaasi pana tva.m, maarisa, tassa bhagavato  upa.t.thaana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti?
text.2231: [03] eva.m vutto {eva.m vutte (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} kho so brahmaa ta.m vacana.m anadhivaasento  sahassakkhattu.m attaana.m abhinimminitvaa subrahmaana.m paccekabrahmaana.m  etadavoca -- ``passasi me no tva.m, maarisa, evaruupa.m  iddhaanubhaava''nti? ``passaami kho tyaaha.m, maarisa, evaruupa.m  iddhaanubhaava''nti. ``so khvaaha.m, maarisa, eva.mmahiddhiko  eva.mmahaanubhaavo kassa a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa upa.t.thaana.m  gamissaamii''ti?

text.2251: [03] 180^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena  kokaaliko bhikkhu aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano.  atha kho turuu {tudu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paccekabrahmaa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no  kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena kokaaliko bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa vehaasa.m ^a^V1.0176^ea^ .thito kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca  -- ``pasaadehi, kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa  saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti. ``kosi tva.m, aavuso''ti? ``aha.m turuu  paccekabrahmaa''ti. ``nanu tva.m, aavuso, bhagavataa ^a^T1.0219^ea^ anaagaamii byaakato,  atha ki~ncarahi idhaagato? passa, yaava~nca te ida.m aparaddha''nti.

text.2268: [03] 181^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0152^ea^. atha kho  kokaaliko bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^P1.0150^ea^;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho kokaaliko bhikkhu ^a^V1.0177^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``paapicchaa, bhante, saariputtamoggallaanaa paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m  gataa''ti. eva.m ^a^T1.0220^ea^ vutte, bhagavaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``maa  heva.m, kokaalika, avaca; maa heva.m, kokaalika, avaca. pasaadehi,  kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa  saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti. dutiyampi kho kokaaliko bhikkhu  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi me, bhante, bhagavaa saddhaayiko  paccayiko; atha kho paapicchaava bhante, saariputtamoggallaanaa paapikaana.m  icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m  etadavoca -- ``maa heva.m, kokaalika, avaca; maa heva.m, kokaalika,  avaca. pasaadehi, kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa  saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti. tatiyampi kho kokaaliko bhikkhu  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi...pe0... icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti.  tatiyampi kho bhagavaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``maa  heva.m...pe0... pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti.
text.2269: [03] atha kho kokaaliko bhikkhu u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa  padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. acirapakkantassa ca kokaalikassa  bhikkhuno saasapamattiihi pii.lakaahi {pi.lakaahi (sii0 pii0)} sabbo kaayo phu.to ahosi.  saasapamattiyo hutvaa muggamattiyo ahesu.m, muggamattiyo hutvaa  kalaayamattiyo ahesu.m, kalaayamattiyo hutvaa kola.t.thimattiyo ahesu.m,  kola.t.thimattiyo hutvaa kolamattiyo ahesu.m, kolamattiyo hutvaa  aamalakamattiyo ahesu.m, aamalakamattiyo hutvaa beluvasalaa.tukamattiyo  ahesu.m, beluvasalaa.tukamattiyo hutvaa billamattiyo ahesu.m, billamattiyo ^a^T1.0221^ea^  hutvaa pabhijji.msu. pubba~nca lohita~nca pagghari.msu. atha kho  kokaaliko bhikkhu teneva aabaadhena kaalamakaasi ^a^P1.0151^ea^.  kaala"nkato ca kokaaliko bhikkhu paduma.m niraya.m upapajji  saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m aaghaatetvaa.
text.2270: [03] atha ^a^M1.0153^ea^ kho brahmaa sahampati abhikkantaaya rattiyaa  abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.  ekamanta.m .thito kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``kokaaliko, bhante, bhikkhu kaala"nkato. kaala"nkato ca, bhante,  kokaaliko bhikkhu paduma.m niraya.m upapanno saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m  aaghaatetvaa''ti. idamavoca brahmaa sahampati, ida.m vatvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayiiti.
text.2271: [03] atha ^a^V1.0178^ea^ kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu  aamantesi -- ``ima.m, bhikkhave, ratti.m brahmaa sahampati abhikkantaaya  rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.  ekamanta.m .thito kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati ma.m etadavoca --  `kokaaliko, bhante, bhikkhu kaala"nkato. kaala"nkato ca, bhante,  kokaaliko bhikkhu paduma.m niraya.m upapanno saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m  aaghaatetvaa'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0222^ea^, brahmaa sahampati, ida.m vatvaa ma.m  abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.
text.2272: [03] eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``kiivadiigha.m nu kho, bhante, padume niraye aayuppamaa.na''nti?  ``diigha.m kho, bhikkhu, padume niraye aayuppamaa.na.m. ta.m na sukara.m  sa"nkhaatu.m -- ettakaani vassaani iti vaa, ettakaani vassasataani  iti vaa, ettakaani vassasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani  vassasatasahassaani iti vaa''ti. ``sakkaa pana, bhante, upama.m  kaatu''nti? ``sakkaa ^a^P1.0152^ea^, bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca  --
text.2273: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhu viisatikhaariko kosalako tilavaaho.  tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekameka.m tila.m  uddhareyya; khippatara.m kho so, bhikkhu, viisatikhaariko kosalako  tilavaaho iminaa upakkamena parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya, na tveva  eko abbudo nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati abbudaa  nirayaa, evameko nirabbudanirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati  nirabbudaa nirayaa, evameko ababo nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu,  viisati ababaa nirayaa, evameko ^a^M1.0154^ea^ a.ta.to nirayo.  seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati a.ta.taa nirayaa, evameko ahaho nirayo.  seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati ahahaa nirayaa, evameko kumudo  nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati kumudaa nirayaa, evameko  sogandhiko nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati sogandhikaa  nirayaa, evameko uppalanirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati  uppalaa nirayaa, evameko pu.n.dariko nirayo. seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0223^ea^, bhikkhu,  viisati pu.n.darikaa nirayaa, evameko padumo nirayo. padume pana,  bhikkhu, niraye kokaaliko bhikkhu upapanno saariputtamoggallaanesu  citta.m aaghaatetvaa''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato  athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --

text.2329: [01] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, raajaa ahosi aru.navaa naama.  ra~n~no kho pana, bhikkhave, aru.navato aru.navatii naama raajadhaanii  ahosi. aru.navati.m kho pana, bhikkhave, raajadhaani.m {aru.navatiya.m kho pana  bhikkhave raajadhaaniya.m (pii0 ka0)} sikhii bhagavaa ^a^T1.0228^ea^  araha.m sammaasambuddho upanissaaya vihaasi. sikhissa kho pana,  bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa abhibhuusambhava.m naama  saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhii  bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho abhibhu.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- `aayaama,  braahma.na, yena a~n~nataro brahmaloko tenupasa"nkamissaama, yaava bhattassa  kaalo bhavissatii'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho bhikkhave, abhibhuu  bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa paccassosi.  atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho abhibhuu ca  bhikkhu -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m  pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- aru.navatiyaa  raajadhaaniyaa antarahitaa tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahesu.m.
text.2330: [03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho  abhibhu.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- `pa.tibhaatu, braahma.na, ta.m brahmuno ca  brahmaparisaaya ca brahmapaarisajjaana~nca dhammii kathaa'ti. `eva.m,  bhante'ti kho, bhikkhave, abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato  sammaasambuddhassa pa.tissutvaa, brahmaana~nca brahmaparisa~nca brahmapaarisajje ca  dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi.  tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, brahmaa ca brahmaparisaa ca brahmapaarisajjaa ^a^P1.0156^ea^  ca ujjhaayanti khiyyanti {khiiyanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vipaacenti -- `acchariya.m vata  ^a^M1.0158^ea^, bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, katha~nhi naama satthari sammukhiibhuute  saavako dhamma.m desessatii'''ti ^a^T1.0229^ea^!
text.2331: [01] ``atha ^a^V1.0183^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa araha.m  sammaasambuddho abhibhu.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- `ujjhaayanti kho te,  braahma.na, brahmaa ca brahmaparisaa ca brahmapaarisajjaa ca -- acchariya.m vata,  bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho, katha~nhi naama satthari sammukhiibhuute saavako  dhamma.m desessatiiti! tena hi tva.m braahma.na, bhiyyosomattaaya brahmaana~nca  brahmaparisa~nca brahmapaarisajje ca sa.mvejehii'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho,  bhikkhave, abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa  pa.tissutvaa dissamaanenapi kaayena dhamma.m desesi, adissamaanenapi  kaayena dhamma.m desesi, dissamaanenapi he.t.thimena upa.d.dhakaayena  adissamaanena uparimena upa.d.dhakaayena dhamma.m desesi, dissamaanenapi  uparimena upa.d.dhakaayena adissamaanena he.t.thimena upa.d.dhakaayena dhamma.m  desesi. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, brahmaa ca brahmaparisaa ca brahmapaarisajjaa  ca acchariyabbhutacittajaataa ahesu.m -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m  vata, bho, sama.nassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa'''ti!
text.2332: [01] ``atha kho abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m  sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `abhijaanaami khvaaha.m, bhante,  bhikkhusa"nghassa majjhe evaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa -- pahomi khvaaha.m  aavuso, brahmaloke .thito sahassilokadhaatu.m ^a^T1.0230^ea^ {sahassiilokadhaatu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} sarena vi~n~naapetu'nti.  `etassa, braahma.na, kaalo, etassa, braahma.na, kaalo; ya.m tva.m, braahma.na,  brahmaloke .thito sahassilokadhaatu.m sarena vi~n~naapeyyaasii'ti. `eva.m,  bhante'ti kho, bhikkhave, abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato  sammaasambuddhassa pa.tissutvaa brahmaloke .thito imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
text.2337: [01] ``atha ^a^M1.0159^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sikhii ca bhagavaa  araha.m sammaasambuddho abhibhuu ca bhikkhu brahmaana~nca brahmaparisa~nca  brahmapaarisajje ca sa.mvejetvaa -- seyyathaapi naama...pe0... tasmi.m  brahmaloke antarahitaa aru.navatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa paaturahesu.m. atha  kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa ^a^V1.0184^ea^ araha.m sammaasambuddho bhikkhuu  aamantesi -- `assuttha no, tumhe, bhikkhave, abhibhussa bhikkhuno  brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'ti? `assumha kho maya.m,  bhante, abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo  bhaasamaanassaa'ti. `yathaa katha.m pana tumhe, bhikkhave, assuttha  abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'''ti?  eva.m kho maya.m, bhante, assumha abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa  gaathaayo bhaasamaanassa --
text.2342: [03] ```eva.m kho maya.m, bhante, assumha abhibhussa bhikkhuno  brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'ti. `saadhu saadhu,  bhikkhave; saadhu kho tumhe, bhikkhave! assuttha abhibhussa bhikkhuno  brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'''ti.
text.2343: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa, attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.

text.2346: [01] atha ^a^M1.0160^ea^ kho bhagavaa pa.thama.m jhaana.m {pa.thamajjhaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0) eva.m  dutiya.m jhaana.m iccaadiisupi} samaapajji.  pa.thamaa jhaanaa {pa.thamajjhaanaa (syaa0 ka.m0) eva.m dutiyaa jhaanaa iccaadiisupi} vu.t.thahitvaa   dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapajji. dutiyaa jhaanaa  vu.t.thahitvaa tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapajji. tatiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa catuttha.m  ^a^V1.0185^ea^ jhaana.m samaapajji. catutthaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samaapajji. aakaasaana~ncaayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samaapajji. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapajji. aaki~nca~n~naayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samaapajji. nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaa ^a^T1.0232^ea^ vu.t.thahitvaa  sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajji.
