text.2374: [03] 187^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0235^ea^ ^a^V1.0187^ea^ ^a^P1.0160^ea^ ^a^M1.0162^ea^ me  suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape.  tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa  dhana~njaanii {dhaana~njaanii (pii0 sii0 a.t.tha0)} naama braahma.nii abhippasannaa hoti buddhe ca dhamme ca sa"nghe  ca. atha kho dhana~njaanii braahma.nii bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa bhatta.m  upasa.mharantii upakkhalitvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi --
text.2378: [01] eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no dhana~njaani.m braahma.ni.m  etadavoca -- ``evameva.m panaaya.m vasalii yasmi.m vaa tasmi.m vaa tassa  mu.n.dakassa sama.nassa va.n.na.m bhaasati. idaani tyaaha.m, vasali, tassa  satthuno vaada.m aaropessaamii''ti. ``na khvaaha.m ta.m, braahma.na, passaami  sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya  sadevamanussaaya, yo tassa bhagavato vaada.m aaropeyya arahato  sammaasambuddhassa. api ca tva.m, braahma.na, gaccha, gantvaa  vijaanissasii''ti {gantvaapi jaanissasiiti (syaa0 ka.m0)}.
text.2379: [03] atha ^a^T1.0236^ea^ kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no kupito anattamano yena  bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.  sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0161^ea^ nisinno kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no  bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
text.2380: [21] ``ki.msu ^a^V1.0188^ea^ chetvaa sukha.m seti, ki.msu chetvaa na  socati.
text.2382: [21] ``kodha.m ^a^M1.0163^ea^ chetvaa sukha.m seti, kodha.m chetvaa na  socati.
text.2384: [22] vadha.m ariyaa pasa.msanti, ta~nhi chetvaa na socatii''ti..
text.2385: [03] eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho  gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa  vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya --  cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena  anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m gotama.m  sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m bhoto  gotamassa santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.
text.2386: [03] alattha kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavato santike pabbajja.m,  alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo eko  vuupaka.t.tho appamatto ^a^T1.0237^ea^ aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva --  yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti  tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m  brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi.  a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosiiti.
text.2388: [03] 188^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane  kalandakanivaape. assosi kho akkosakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no --  ``bhaaradvaajagotto kira braahma.no sama.nassa gotamassa santike  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti kupito anattamano yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P1.0162^ea^ bhagavanta.m asabbhaahi  pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosati paribhaasati.
text.2389: [01] eva.m ^a^V1.0189^ea^ vutte, bhagavaa akkosakabhaaradvaaja.m braahma.na.m  etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, api nu kho te  aagacchanti mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa atithiyo {atithayo (?)}''ti? ``appekadaa  me, bho gotama, aagacchanti mittaamaccaa ^a^M1.0164^ea^ ~naatisaalohitaa  atithiyo''ti. ```ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, api nu tesa.m  anuppadesi khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa saayaniiya.m vaa'''ti?  ```appekadaa nesaaha.m, bho gotama, anuppademi khaadaniiya.m vaa  bhojaniiya.m vaa saayaniiya.m vaa'''ti. ```sace kho pana te, braahma.na,  nappa.tigga.nhanti ^a^T1.0238^ea^, kassa ta.m hotii'''ti? ```sace te, bho gotama,  nappa.tigga.nhanti, amhaakameva ta.m hotii'''ti. ``evameva kho,  braahma.na, ya.m tva.m amhe anakkosante akkosasi, arosente rosesi,  abha.n.dante bha.n.dasi, ta.m te maya.m nappa.tigga.nhaama. taveveta.m, braahma.na,  hoti; taveveta.m, braahma.na, hoti''.
text.2390: [03] ``yo kho, braahma.na, akkosanta.m paccakkosati, rosenta.m  pa.tiroseti, bha.n.danta.m pa.tibha.n.dati, aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, sambhu~njati  viitiharatiiti. te maya.m tayaa neva sambhu~njaama na viitiharaama.  taveveta.m, braahma.na, hoti; taveveta.m, braahma.na, hotii''ti. ``bhavanta.m kho  gotama.m saraajikaa parisaa eva.m jaanaati -- `araha.m sama.no gotamo'ti.  atha ca pana bhava.m gotamo kujjhatii''ti.
text.2398: [22] janaa ma~n~nanti baaloti, ye dhammassa akovidaa''ti..
text.2399: [03] eva.m ^a^V1.0190^ea^ ^a^P1.0163^ea^ vutte, akkosakabhaaradvaajo  braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0...  esaaha.m ^a^T1.0239^ea^ bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca.  labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m  upasampada''nti.
text.2400: [03] alattha kho akkosakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavato santike  pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho panaayasmaa  akkosakabhaaradvaajo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto  viharanto ^a^M1.0165^ea^ nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m  di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi.  ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m naapara.m  itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo  arahata.m ahosiiti.
text.2402: [03] 189^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane  kalandakanivaape. assosi kho asurindakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no --  ``bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no kira sama.nassa gotamassa santike  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti kupito anattamano yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi  akkosati paribhaasati. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho  asurindakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``jitosi,  sama.na, jitosi, sama.naa''ti.

text.2491: [03] ``atha kassa caaha.m, bho gotama, ima.m habyasesa.m dammii''ti?  ``na khvaaha.m, braahma.na, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake  sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yasseso habyaseso bhutto  sammaa pari.naama.m gaccheyya ^a^P1.0169^ea^ a~n~natra, braahma.na,  tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa. tena hi tva.m, braahma.na, ta.m  habyasesa.m appaharite vaa cha.d.dehi appaa.nake vaa udake opilaapehii''ti.
text.2492: [03] atha kho sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no ta.m habyasesa.m appaa.nake  udake opilaapesi. atha kho so habyaseso udake pakkhitto  cicci.taayati ^a^M1.0171^ea^ ci.tici.taayati sandhuupaayati sampadhuupaayati  ^a^V1.0197^ea^. seyyathaapi naama ^a^T1.0248^ea^ phaalo {loho (ka0)} divasa.msantatto  {divasasantatto (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} udake pakkhitto  cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati sandhuupaayati sampadhuupaayati; evameva so  habyaseso udake pakkhitto cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati sandhuupaayati  sampadhuupaayati.

text.2627: [03] atha ^a^P1.0177^ea^ kho na.m braahma.namahaasaala.m puttaa ghara.m  netvaa nhaapetvaa pacceka.m dussayugena acchaadesu.m. atha kho so  braahma.namahaasaalo eka.m dussayuga.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  braahma.namahaasaalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``maya.m, bho gotama, braahma.naa  naama aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesaama. pa.tigga.nhatu me bhava.m  gotamo aacariyadhana''nti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya.  atha kho so braahma.namahaasaalo bhagavanta.m ^a^V1.0207^ea^ etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu  ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
text.2629: [03] 201^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0261^ea^. tena kho pana samayena  maanatthaddho naama braahma.no saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati. so neva maatara.m  abhivaadeti, na pitara.m abhivaadeti, na aacariya.m abhivaadeti, na  je.t.thabhaatara.m abhivaadeti. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa mahatiyaa  parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m deseti. atha kho maanatthaddhassa braahma.nassa  etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho sama.no gotamo mahatiyaa parisaaya  parivuto dhamma.m deseti. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkameyya.m.  sace ma.m sama.no gotamo aalapissati, ahampi ta.m aalapissaami.  no ce ma.m sama.no gotamo aalapissati, ahampi naalapissaamii''ti.  atha kho maanatthaddho braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m  naalapi. atha kho maanatthaddho braahma.no -- `naaya.m sama.no ^a^M1.0180^ea^  gotamo ki~nci jaanaatii'ti tatova puna nivattitukaamo ahosi.  atha ^a^P1.0178^ea^ kho bhagavaa maanatthaddhassa braahma.nassa cetasaa  cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya maanatthaddha.m braahma.na.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
text.2632: [03] atha kho maanatthaddho braahma.no -- ``citta.m me sama.no gotamo  jaanaatii''ti tattheva bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavato  paadaani ^a^T1.0262^ea^ mukhena ca paricumbati paa.niihi ca parisambaahati, naama~nca  saaveti -- ``maanatthaddhaaha.m, bho gotama, maanatthaddhaaha.m, bho gotamaa''ti.  atha kho saa parisaa abbhutacittajaataa {abbhutacittajaataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0), acchariyabbhutacittajaataa (ka0)} ahosi -- `acchariya.m vata  bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! aya~nhi maanatthaddho braahma.no neva maatara.m  abhivaadeti, na pitara.m abhivaadeti, na aacariya.m abhivaadeti, na  je.t.thabhaatara.m abhivaadeti; atha ca pana sama.ne gotame evaruupa.m  paramanipaccakaara.m karotii'ti. atha kho bhagavaa maanatthaddha.m braahma.na.m  etadavoca -- ``ala.m, braahma.na ^a^V1.0208^ea^, u.t.thehi, sake aasane nisiida.  yato te mayi citta.m pasanna''nti. atha kho maanatthaddho braahma.no  sake aasane nisiiditvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
text.2633: [21] ``kesu na maana.m kayiraatha, kesu cassa sagaaravo.

text.2661: [03] 204^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati  a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa  bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa ^a^T1.0265^ea^ sambahulaa antevaasikaa ka.t.thahaarakaa  maa.navakaa yena vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa addasa.msu  bhagavanta.m tasmi.m vanasa.n.de nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m  pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. disvaana yena bhaaradvaajagotto  braahma.no tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhaaradvaajagotta.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m  -- ``yagghe, bhava.m jaaneyyaasi! asukasmi.m vanasa.n.de sama.no  nisinno palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m  upa.t.thapetvaa''. atha kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no tehi maa.navakehi  saddhi.m yena so vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavanta.m tasmi.m  vanasa.n.de nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m  sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
text.2682: [03] eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... ajjatagge  paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
text.2684: [03] 205^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho maatuposako  braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m  sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho maatuposako braahma.no bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``aha~nhi, bho ^a^T1.0267^ea^ gotama, dhammena bhikkha.m pariyesaami,  dhammena bhikkha.m pariyesitvaa maataapitaro posemi. kaccaaha.m, bho  gotama, eva.mkaarii kiccakaarii homii''ti? ``taggha tva.m, braahma.na,  eva.mkaarii kiccakaarii hosi. yo kho, braahma.na, dhammena bhikkha.m  pariyesati, dhammena bhikkha.m ^a^P1.0182^ea^ pariyesitvaa  maataapitaro poseti, bahu.m so pu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti.

text.2697: [03] 207^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena  sa"ngaaravo naama braahma.no saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati udakasuddhiko, udakena  parisuddhi.m pacceti, saaya.m paata.m udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati.  atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya  saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya ^a^V1.0213^ea^ paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa  pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0183^ea^  nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``idha, bhante, sa"ngaaravo naama braahma.no saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati  udakasuddhiko ^a^M1.0185^ea^, udakena suddhi.m pacceti, saaya.m paata.m  udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa yena  sa"ngaaravassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti.  adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.
text.2698: [03] atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena  sa"ngaaravassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami ^a^T1.0269^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte  aasane nisiidi. atha kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m  katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m  kho sa"ngaarava.m braahma.na.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m,  braahma.na, udakasuddhiko, udakena suddhi.m paccesi, saaya.m paata.m  udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharasii''ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''.  ``ki.m pana tva.m, braahma.na, atthavasa.m sampassamaano udakasuddhiko,  udakasuddhi.m paccesi, saaya.m paata.m udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto  viharasii''ti? ``idha me, bho gotama {idha me bho gotama aha.m (pii0 ka0)}, ya.m divaa paapakamma.m kata.m  hoti, ta.m saaya.m nhaanena {nahaanena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pavaahemi, ya.m ratti.m paapakamma.m kata.m hoti ta.m  paata.m nhaanena pavaahemi. ima.m khvaaha.m, bho gotama, atthavasa.m  sampassamaano udakasuddhiko, udakena suddhi.m paccemi, saaya.m paata.m  udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharaamii''ti.
text.2703: [03] eva.m vutte, sa"ngaaravo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m  bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
text.2705: [03] 208^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0270^ea^ ^a^V1.0214^ea^ ^a^P1.0184^ea^ me suta.m --  eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati khomadussa.m naama.m sakyaana.m nigamo.  atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa ^a^M1.0186^ea^ pattaciivaramaadaaya  khomadussa.m nigama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tena kho pana samayena  khomadussakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa sabhaaya.m sannipatitaa honti kenacideva  kara.niiyena, devo ca ekameka.m phusaayati. atha kho bhagavaa yena saa  sabhaa tenupasa"nkami. addasa.msu khomadussakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m  duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana etadavocu.m -- ``ke ca mu.n.dakaa  sama.nakaa, ke ca sabhaadhamma.m jaanissantii''ti? atha kho bhagavaa  khomadussake braahma.nagahapatike gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

text.2710: [01] eva.m vutte, khomadussakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m  etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama;  seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa  vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m  dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti, evameva.m bhotaa gotamena  anekapariyaayena ^a^T1.0271^ea^ dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m  gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu  ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m gate''ti.

text.2719: [03] 209^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0272^ea^ ^a^V1.0215^ea^ ^a^M1.0187^ea^ ^a^P1.0185^ea^ me  suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa va"ngiiso aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave  cetiye aayasmataa nigrodhakappena upajjhaayena saddhi.m. tena kho pana  samayena aayasmaa va"ngiiso navako hoti acirapabbajito ohiyyako  vihaarapaalo. atha kho sambahulaa itthiyo samala"nkaritvaa yena  aggaa.lavako aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.msu vihaarapekkhikaayo. atha kho  aayasmato va"ngiisassa taa itthiyo disvaa anabhirati uppajjati,  raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi  -- ``alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa; dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me  suladdha.m; yassa me anabhirati uppannaa, raago citta.m anuddha.mseti, ta.m  kutettha labbhaa, ya.m me paro anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadeyya.  ya.mnuunaaha.m attanaava attano anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m  uppaadeyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso attanaava attano  anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadetvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo  abhaasi --

text.2731: [03] 210^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0188^ea^ samaya.m...pe0... aayasmaa  va"ngiiso aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye aayasmataa  nigrodhakappena upajjhaayena saddhi.m. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa  nigrodhakappo pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto vihaara.m pavisati, saaya.m vaa  nikkhamati aparajju vaa kaale. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato  va"ngiisassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. atha  kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``alaabhaa vata me, na vata  me laabhaa; dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m; yassa me anabhirati  uppannaa, raago citta.m anuddha.mseti; ta.m kutettha labbhaa, ya.m me paro  anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadeyya. ya.mnuunaaha.m attanaava  attano anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadeyya''nti. atha ^a^T1.0274^ea^ kho  aayasmaa va"ngiiso attanaava attano anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m  uppaadetvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --

text.3470: [03] 268^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0275^ea^ jetavane. tatra  kho...pe0... etadavoca -- ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro yakkho  dubba.n.no oko.timako sakkassa devaanamindassa aasane nisinno  ahosi. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa ujjhaayanti  khiyyanti vipaacenti -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho!  aya.m yakkho dubba.n.no oko.timako sakkassa devaanamindassa aasane  nisinno'''ti! yathaa ^a^T1.0349^ea^ yathaa kho, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa  ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti, tathaa tathaa so yakkho  abhiruupataro ceva hoti dassaniiyataro ca paasaadikataro ca.
text.3471: [01] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa yena sakko  devaanamindo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m  etadavocu.m -- `idha te, maarisa, a~n~nataro yakkho dubba.n.no  oko.timako sakkassa devaanamindassa aasane nisinno. tatra suda.m,  maarisa, devaa taavati.msaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti --  acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! aya.m yakkho dubba.n.no  oko.timako ^a^P1.0238^ea^ sakkassa devaanamindassa aasane  nisinnoti. yathaa yathaa kho, maarisa, devaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti  vipaacenti, tathaa tathaa so yakkho abhiruupataro ceva hoti  dassaniiyataro ^a^M1.0240^ea^ ca paasaadikataro caati. so hi nuuna,  maarisa, kodhabhakkho yakkho bhavissatii'''ti.
text.3472: [03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo yena so  kodhabhakkho yakkho tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m  karitvaa dakkhi.najaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m nihantvaa yena so kodhabhakkho  yakkho tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m naama.m saaveti -- `sakkoha.m  maarisa, devaanamindo, sakkoha.m, maarisa, devaanamindo'ti. yathaa  yathaa kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo naama.m saavesi, tathaa tathaa  so yakkho dubba.n.nataro ceva ahosi oko.timakataro ca.  dubba.n.nataro ceva ^a^T1.0350^ea^ hutvaa oko.timakataro ca tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.  atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo sake aasane nisiiditvaa deve  taavati.mse anunayamaano taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
